attributes.action: Knight Ben Stokes and pay for his back rehab for carrying a whole country
attributes.background: As a hero and an inspiration to all around the world, Ben Stokes deserves a knighting and his back rehabilitation paid for having carried a not only a team but a nation to World Cup victory.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
